// This file contains the test vectors for the alu.
// Columns: (0 is rightmost column)
// ------inputs------
// [53:51] - select variable: sel
// [50:35] - a input (16 bits)
// [34:19] - b input (16 bits)
// [18] - carry in variable: ci
// ------outputs------
// [17] - carry out variable: co
// [16:1] - s output (16 bits)
// [0] - zero flag variable: zflag
//
// select not a
111_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_0__0_1111111111111111_0
111_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_1__0_1111111111111111_0
111_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_0__0_0000111100001111_0
111_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_1__0_0000111100001111_0
111_1111111111111111_1010101010101010_0__0_0000000000000000_1
111_1111111111111111_1010101010101010_1__0_0000000000000000_1
// select a ^ b
110_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_0__0_1010101010101010_0
110_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_1__0_1010101010101010_0
110_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_0__0_0101101001011010_0
110_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_1__0_0101101001011010_0
110_1010101010101010_1010101010101010_0__0_0000000000000000_1
110_1010101010101010_1010101010101010_1__0_0000000000000000_1
// select a | b
101_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_0__0_1010101010101010_0
101_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_1__0_1010101010101010_0
101_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_0__0_1111101011111010_0
101_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_1__0_1111101011111010_0
101_0000000000000000_0000000000000000_0__0_0000000000000000_1
101_0000000000000000_0000000000000000_1__0_0000000000000000_1
// select a & b
100_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_0__0_0000000000000000_1
100_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_1__0_0000000000000000_1
100_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_0__0_1010000010100000_0
100_1111000011110000_1010101010101010_1__0_1010000010100000_0
// select a + b + ci
000_0101010101010101_1010101010101010_0__0_1111111111111111_0
000_0101010101010101_1010101010101010_1__1_0000000000000000_1
000_0000000000000001_1111111111111110_0__0_1111111111111111_0
000_0000000000000001_1111111111111110_1__1_0000000000000000_1
000_0000000000001111_0000000000001111_0__0_0000000000011110_0
000_0000000000001111_0000000000001111_1__0_0000000000011111_0
// select a - b - ci
001_0000000000001000_0000000000000111_0__0_0000000000000001_0
001_0000000000001000_0000000000000111_1__0_0000000000000000_1
001_0000000000000111_0000000000001000_0__1_1111111111111111_0
001_0000000000000111_0000000000001000_1__1_1111111111111110_0
// select a + 1
010_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_0__0_0000000000000001_0
010_0000000000000000_1010101010101010_1__0_0000000000000001_0
010_0000000000001111_1010101010101010_0__0_0000000000010000_0
010_0000000000001111_1010101010101010_1__0_0000000000010000_0
010_1111111111111111_1010101010101010_0__1_0000000000000000_1
010_1111111111111111_1010101010101010_1__1_0000000000000000_1
// select b with no-op and carry out set
011_1010101010101010_0000000000000000_0__1_0000000000000000_1
011_1010101010101010_0000000000000000_1__1_0000000000000000_1
011_1010101010101010_0000000011111111_0__1_0000000011111111_0
011_1010101010101010_0000000011111111_1__1_0000000011111111_0
